Hello Rebecca:
You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do

Preparing Your Return:
1. Consult the instructions on how to return a product <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item
3. Remove any protective cover or screen protector it has
4. Package your item and its accessories following these tips

Packaging the Item:
• The box must be strong and resistant. You must place your item securely inside the box so it doesn't move during transit.
• Attach the return label to the top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify your shipment in case the original label peels off or becomes damaged).
• Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your item is damaged during transportation.

Your return is ready for shipping! We'll inform you when it arrives.
Best regards,
The Customer Service Team at Back Market, The Customer Service Team at Back Market
